channel.title: The SSFL Podcast
channel.itunes:author: SSFL
channel.description: Current events, hot takes and everything in between from the SSFL.

item.title: September 26, 2021: Welcome Back
item.description: The boys are back. Kevin, Erik, Justin and Brendan recap the 2021 draft and first couple weeks of the season, then look forward to week 3.

item.title: October 3, 2021: Matt Ryan ist wunderbar
item.description: Tony joins Brendan, Erik, and Kevin for a recap of week 3, the introduction of a new weekly segment and the return of a classic.

item.title: October 7, 2021: Cordarrelle Patterson Support Group
item.description: Erik, Kevin and Tony join Brendan for a special after dark edition of the SSFL podcast. Kevin's in a dark place, Brendan makes the case for QBs and Erik and Tony discuss which number in the slimmest.

item.title: October 14, 2021: Remember to Close the Gates
item.description: Brendan and Erik take a little trip down Memory Lane. Kevin doubles down on emotional daggers, and Tony hardly even mentions he's 5-0.

item.title: October 17, 2021: The One True Herbert
item.description: Tony mentions he's 5-0 and currently blasting Erik at least once, Kevin's just asking the question and Justin makes a special appearance to talk about feelings. The boys mourn the loss of the Sundowner.

item.title: October 21, 2021: Defence Wins Championships
item.description: Kevin gets a little worked up about Shar's team, Brendan and Tony talk rookie QBs, and we take a deep dive into the matchups for week 7.

item.title: October 27, 2021: Four Muscular Men
item.description: Erik and Tony has some scary stories to tell in the dark. Kevin's back at it with another shotgun bet, and Brendan takes a look at the best (and worst) franchsises in the SSFL.

item.title: November 3, 2021: The NFL is the best reality TV
item.description: Erik cracks the Chief's offence, Tony continues his reign as league heel, and Kevin's obsession with Russ continues. Brendan hosts a little bad QB draft for week 9 and everyone discusses all the drama happening in the NFL and inside the SSFL.

item.title: November 10, 2021: The Full Prescott
item.description: Erik's got a hot take on offensive penalties, Tony is in mourning, but it's totally fine and not at all indicative of things to come. Brendan doesn't know how to pick running backs, and Kevin's got no Love for it.

item.title: November 18, 2021: Overall Dickery
item.description: Kevin just can't let go of Russ, Erik's got some more spicy ideas to change up the league. Brendan and Tony break down their big pre-deadline trades and the boys start to dive into who's got a hope for playoffs and who will be duking it out for the Pronley.

item.title: December 5, 2021: Because Kenny Asked For It
item.description: Erik and Brendan pick up the slack for a very hungover Kevin and absentee Tony. They go over some playoff prospects and the matches for this week. Also shotgun bets, lots of shotgun bets.

item.title: December 9, 2021: High Content Equity
item.description: For the first time this season, the boys get a very special guest caller, here to check receipts. Erik breaks down everyone's playoff (and Pronley) prospects. Tony's praying for Kyle to start a QB, and Brendan's playing rock, paper, scissors or something.

item.title: December 17, 2021: SSFL: Into the Multiverse
item.description: The gang's all here to break down the first round of the playoffs. Erik's got receipts. Erik goes above and beyond and delves into what could have been. Erik carries the pod, mostly. The boys discuss Kenny's hubris and eventual downfall.

item.title: December 21, 2021: The Best Team and Person in SSFL History
item.description: "I'm the best human being in SSFL history to not make playoffs" - Kenny Welsh, probably

item.title: January 1, 2022: It's the Final Countdown
item.description: Kevin's starting a war on Christmas, Tony thinks he's the Aaron Rodgers of the SSFL, but actually vaccinated. Erik's sweating a Pronley.

item.title: January 12, 2022: And The Award Goes To....
item.description: The 2021 SSFL award nominees are in, and the Academy has voted. Erik recaps what it probably the most exciting Pronley in SSFL history, and takes a look forward at the 2022 draft. Oh, and I guess something good happened for Tony or something.
